doc.field: Includes a photo of HRL sitting on an airplane; HRL and Harry S. Truman surrounded by children in Rome; HRL sitting in an office in London; HRL speaking with Gamal Abdel Nasser; HRL at the opening of LIFE "Illuminations" at the Metropolitan (Museum of Art?); HRL receiving an award from the National Conference of Christians and Jews; HRL and Dr. Alu Amini at the Council on Islamic Affairs luncheon; contact sheet with images from HRL's trip to Egypt; various photos with HRL from the ceremony where he awarded an Oscar to the Italian actress Anna Magnani in Rome and the reception that followed; HRL standing next to a sitting Pope Pius XII; HRL at a luncheon of the Institute on Ethics?; HRL receiving a Drexel Institute of Technology award; HRL at the Milan Fair; and Clare Boothe Luce inside a car with a man in Milan.
